title: Kanaka Jhumka - Heritage Diamond and Gemstone Earrings
materials: 22K Yellow Gold (916 Gold). Features high-quality CZ Diamonds
and striking Emeralds. Finished with a durable Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: Classic Jhumka design with intricate filigree work, set with sparkling CZ diamonds in a delicate floral pattern. Accented with pops of color from the ruby and emerald gemstones. The bell-shaped structure is adorned with dangling gold beads, known as 'gundlu', adding graceful movement. The top includes floral designs with gemstones in a cluster.
colors: complemented by the fiery red of the rubies
the lush green of the emeralds
and the dazzling white brilliance of the CZ diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for traditional South Indian events such as weddings (Pelli)
and other auspicious occasions. Also suitable for adding a touch of ethnic elegance to modern celebrations.
description: These Kanaka Jhumkas showcase exceptional craftsmanship and timeless design. The combination of traditional South Indian motifs and modern sparkle makes them a versatile and treasured addition to any jewelry collection. Made with high-quality materials and careful attention to detail, these earrings are both beautiful and durable. A statement piece that embodies the rich heritage of Telugu jewelry. They are lightweight and comfortable for extended wear.
